import React from 'react' export default function ViewBook(props) { return (
{ props.API_data.map((data) => { return (
Book Title : {data.book_name} { props.setData(data) }}> { props.deleteData(data._id) }}>

{`${(data.author_name)}`}

{data.book_type}

{data.no_of_pages}

{data.ratings}
) }) }
) }
